paragraphs.text: A flawless interview (or series of them)? Check! If you’re hiring a string of terrible, horrible, no good, very bad employees, however, it’s probably at the interview stage where things are going wrong.
paragraphs.name: fb02

paragraphs.text: Want to stop hiring losers? Wouldn’t you rather hire employees who are likely to become superstars at your company?
“Tell me about your best content marketing campaign of all time and what was so great about it?”
paragraphs.name: 923d

paragraphs.text: In marketing, it’s all about the almighty return on investment (ROI). But everyone has their own definition of ROI.
paragraphs.name: 12a0

paragraphs.text: It can be really tough to figure out from a 30-minute interview whether you’ve just interviewed someone who is truly excellent, or who is just a charming liar.
paragraphs.name: c60b

paragraphs.text: Continuing our hiring example, one obvious answer to the question is to start working on a new piece of content. But what I really want to know is how they research topics. What’s their process? How do they pick where to focus?
paragraphs.name: f971

paragraphs.text: Stellar references? Check! But you can be sure that any references you contact will have nothing but great things to say. Well, duh! Your applicant picked them. I actually ignore these and rely on unfurnished references — I figure out an applicant’s old boss or peers and contact them. If they have anything less than enthusiastically positive to say, this is a huge warning sign.
paragraphs.name: 430b

paragraphs.text: All you have to do is adapt these three questions for your particular industry or a specific role:
These three questions will act as your personal unicorn detector, to help you separate the great people from the average during the interview process.
paragraphs.name: 59e0

paragraphs.text: If what they turn in is great, then great! If not, then move on.

Yes, many applicants will scoff at giving away their talents for free. Consider offering to pay them a little something for their time and effort to create the sample. It’s better to spend a few bucks now to find out rather than putting them on the payroll before you find out the truth.
paragraphs.name: 363c

2f4d362ead71.title: It’s just an interpretation that is from a manager’s perspective.

paragraphs.text: It’s just an interpretation that is from a manager’s perspective. It’s usually not the best person to contact. The best IMO are the co-workers they directly interface with as they will have a greater amount of time interfacing and working on projects. Besides…managers are, by policy, typically not allowed to say much that could land a company in court if the applicant doesn’t work out.
paragraphs.name: 783f

d7114d0a64db.title: Sorry, but great content takes a team. You know that tho.

paragraphs.text: Sorry, but great content takes a team. You know that tho.
paragraphs.name: 1bcd

66c9a6cd2545.title: These suggestion are good not only for those doing the hiring but also for those getting hired.

paragraphs.text: These suggestion are good not only for those doing the hiring but also for those getting hired. Going into interviews with a different mindset from other contenders can give job seekers an edge in the interview process. This is even more valuable to give them a mindset for how to get off on the right foot and succeed in their new job.
paragraphs.name: fc5e

bfa5d7d9cdd.title: It seems to me that all questions focus on work methodologies’ of each candidate.

paragraphs.text: It seems to me that all questions focus on work methodologies’ of each candidate. Won’t you mind to leave aside personalilty(work culture, mindset, work rate, humor) with these technical questions or personality is perceived in the answers?

5c3052d337db.title: I wouldn’t want to know their best.

paragraphs.text: I wouldn’t want to know their best. I’d rather focus on what was one campaign they did related to my company. I would want to know how close they are to my culture in my company.
paragraphs.name: cda1

1a0c729d78b0.title: That’s fine if you are interviewing for a person in charge to track that.

paragraphs.text: That’s fine if you are interviewing for a person in charge to track that. In either case tho why not ask specifically about the tools they used and how they moved toward determining EFFECTIVE ROI?
paragraphs.name: 70a9

paragraphs.text: Hiring Tree Farm Workers
paragraphs.name: a9dc

paragraphs.text: This is a totally different tack. There aren’t many container based tree nurseries in my part of Canada. There is no pool of experience workers. So I am hiring inexperienced workers.
paragraphs.name: bdf1

paragraphs.text: Most tree farm tasks are dull as dishwater. Transplanting is a 4 stage process taking 10–25…
paragraphs.name: e783

virtuals.subtitle: This is a totally different tack. There aren’t many container based tree nurseries in my part of Canada. There is no pool of experience…

content.subtitle: This is a totally different tack. There aren’t many container based tree nurseries in my part of Canada. There is no pool of experience…

3495ab4c2526.title: It should be the first six months in your culture…..three

paragraphs.text: It should be the first six months in your culture…..three months getting used to your business’s process and then three months immersed in it.
paragraphs.name: f88c

fa8e13dbd4b2.title: Funny. When I worked at Ersnt & Young I was required to interview people.

paragraphs.text: Funny. When I worked at Ersnt & Young I was required to interview people. The person woild come in and give me their resume. I would say, “You have successfully passed allot steps to reach me. Let’s understand who you are”. I would ask questions like, “what was your favourite Xmas” or “what would you do with $1 million dollars”. The answers were not…

67e7bb3a785c.title: The best of superstars are not available, but rather groomed by mentoring managers.

paragraphs.text: The best of superstars are not available, but rather groomed by mentoring managers. An interview or a set of them doesn’t always equate into a day to day superstar.
paragraphs.name: 8c47

c389e2808241.title: Really? I wouldn’t. The payoff is if they get the job.

paragraphs.text: Really? I wouldn’t. The payoff is if they get the job.

12f152c9b5b9.title: My answer to your first question would have been….the

paragraphs.text: My answer to your first question would have been….the next one my list of todos, but you want something more specific…so put those specifics in your question. Don’t leave it so open for the applicant to guess at what you want to hear about.
paragraphs.name: 62d7

13abb5a9690f.title: Big difference tho between interviewer (if not the manager an applicant will report to) and the…

paragraphs.text: Big difference tho between interviewer (if not the manager an applicant will report to) and the person that applicant reports to. It can also be a flawed culture that applicant enters.
paragraphs.name: 04b2

b85a4feab0f6.title: You’re about to make an investment in the area of several hundreds of thousands of dollars.

paragraphs.text: You’re about to make an investment in the area of several hundreds of thousands of dollars. I would expect more specific questions and a hell of a lot longer than a single 30 minute interview. I would expect exposure to your team and a trial period of working with them…..that or at least a round of interviews with your team. You’re looking for…
paragraphs.name: cc37

23027f14be79.title: This is actually impossible know until they work in your culture.

paragraphs.text: This is actually impossible know until they work in your culture.
paragraphs.name: e5ed

c9917c4c1335.title: I also believe that questions that would make you understand the attitude of the person you are…

paragraphs.text: I also believe that questions that would make you understand the attitude of the person you are hiring is what you should ask. Knowledge grows and if the person has a good attitude for learning and also with the questions above, a unicorn would indeed be found.

virtuals.subtitle: However, I am also not a fan of asking real abstract questions that have no basic correlation with the organization.

content.subtitle: However, I am also not a fan of asking real abstract questions that have no basic correlation with the organization.

e8ab0617fc06.title: The 3 Most Important Questions You Can Ask When Hiring

paragraphs.text: The 3 Most Important Questions You Can Ask When Hiring
paragraphs.name: 4ba5

virtuals.subtitle: You want to smartly and quickly add great employees who will help your business thrive and grow.

content.subtitle: You want to smartly and quickly add great employees who will help your business thrive and grow.
